name: Kids Game Learn Colors
description:
Welcome To Kids Game Learn Colors...

Kids Game Learn Colors: - Preschool Kids is a free app designed to help 'toddlers' learn basic of "' Colors Name' using interactive "maths learning" games. It's targeted toward 2 - 4 years old 'toddlers' and 'nursery kids'.

There are Four 'maths learning' module which designed to teach and ' Colors Names'. We believe 'Spelling learning for nursery kids' and "Colors Name for Toddlers" should be simple, free, interactive and engaging so that they do not get overwhelmed. Our "Toddler Color Name and Spelling" Free app make 'Spelling learning for nursery kids' and 'toddlers' fun and simple.

Kids Game Learn Colors Futures: -

1. Colors Name and Identify Colors by sound: - Learn to identify and touch Colors by it's sound
2. Learn Colors Name With Fun And Attractive Objects.
3. Practice Colors Name: - Identify Colors In Sequence.
4. Game :- Touch on Particular Colors by Speak Sound.

# Our motto: -
' Colors Name for Toddlers' should be fun. Spelling should be fun. Learning should be fun. We believe that these 3 'Spelling learning' modules will make 'spelling learning for nursery kids' and toddlers fun activity and will create a good understanding of ' Colors Name & Spelling'.
